attributes.action: Parents/Guardians To Have Options On Burial Land ie; Lawn, Traditional etc
attributes.additional_details: In Many cemeteries babies are automatically given a lawn type grave. This means that kerbing is non allowed. My view is that this is the last and only thing bereaved parents can do. Making their child's final resting place nice neat and enabling them to maintain the babies bed can help ease the feeling of grief please please sign this position
